description: This file defines a React component for a navigational sidebar, including a nested NavItem component for individual links with active state styling. It primarily manages the user interface for navigation within a web application, with styling and link behaviors.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React functional component for rendering a navigational link with active state styling based on current pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main navigation sidebar component containing multiple NavItems with styled layout and background.
